effect.name: Phase
effect.description: Delay interlaced video by one field time so that the field order changes
effect.author: libavfilter

parameter.name: av.mode
parameter.paramlistdisplay: Delay the Bottom Field,Delay the Top Field,Keep the Field Order,Capture Field Order Automatically and Transfer Opposite,Capture Unknown or Varying and Transfer Opposite,Capture Top-first and Transfer Unknown or Varying,Capture Bottom-first and Transfer Unknown or Varying,Capture Determined by Field Flags and Transfer Unknown or Varying,Both Capture and Transfer Unknown or Varying
parameter.name: Mode:
